post.author: Gunman
post.body:
(If the mods think this should be in a different section, feel free to move it)

On Windows 7, I can't seem to run the sinlgeplayer component of this game, I can run MP though but that's not what I wanted.
I tried disabling Aero, tried running it in XP (SP3) compatibility mode but still nothing.
Is there ANY way around this??

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
Gunman wrote:
(If the mods think this should be in a different section, feel free to move it)

On Windows 7, I can't seem to run the sinlgeplayer component of this game, I can run MP though but that's not what I wanted.
I tried disabling Aero, tried running it in XP (SP3) compatibility mode but still nothing.
Is there ANY way around this??

weird... it works in mine.
Try to take a look at this
http://www.sevenforums.com/gaming/25111 ... s-7-a.html

post.author: Gunman
post.body:
nHancer did an adequate job. It works now.
Thanks for the link m8. ^^
